tasks.title: Implement /owner/settings page
tasks.description: Create a settings page for the owner to adjust brand colors.
tasks.details: Include color pickers for Primary, Secondary, Accent, Background, and Text colors. Add 'Save' and 'Reset' buttons.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that color pickers are functional and change local state.

tasks.title: Create Centralized Theme Context
tasks.description: Implement a React context to manage and provide theme colors.
tasks.details: Use CSS variables in the root to apply colors globally. Persist theme to localStorage.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that changing context state updates the applied CSS variables.

tasks.title: Apply Theme to Homepage
tasks.description: Update the homepage to use brand theme variables.
tasks.details: Replace hardcoded colors (like emerald-600) with CSS variables defined in the ThemeContext.
tasks.testStrategy: Change color in settings and verify homepage updates immediately.

tasks.title: Apply Theme to Booking Flow
tasks.description: Update all steps of the booking flow to respect the brand theme.
tasks.details: Apply theme colors to step indicators, buttons, and progress bars in the booking flow.
tasks.testStrategy: Navigate through booking flow and verify theme consistency.

tasks.title: Apply Theme to Confirmation & Receipt
tasks.description: Ensure the success page and receipt simulation use brand colors.
tasks.details: Updates icons, badges, and headers on the confirmation screen.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete a booking and verify the success screen matches the brand colors.
